query.esql:
FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase IS NOT NULL AND k8s.namespace.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp) 
    BY k8s.pod.name, k8s.pod.phase
| EVAL phase_name = CASE(
    k8s.pod.phase == 1, "Pending",
    k8s.pod.phase == 2, "Running",
    k8s.pod.phase == 3, "Succeeded",
    k8s.pod.phase == 4, "Failed",
    "Unknown"
  )
| STATS 
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name),
    pod_names = VALUES(k8s.pod.name)
    BY phase_name
| SORT phase_name

FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase IS NOT NULL AND k8s.namespace.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp) 
    BY k8s.pod.name, k8s.pod.phase
| EVAL phase_name = CASE(
    k8s.pod.phase == 1, "Pending",
    k8s.pod.phase == 2, "Running",
    k8s.pod.phase == 3, "Succeeded",
    k8s.pod.phase == 4, "Failed",
    "Unknown"
  )
| STATS 
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name),
    pod_names = VALUES(k8s.pod.name)
    BY phase_name
| SORT phase_name

FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase IS NOT NULL AND k8s.namespace.name IS NOT NULL
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp) 
    BY k8s.pod.name, k8s.pod.phase
| EVAL phase_name = CASE(
    k8s.pod.phase == 1, "Pending",
    k8s.pod.phase == 2, "Running",
    k8s.pod.phase == 3, "Succeeded",
    k8s.pod.phase == 4, "Failed",
    "Unknown"
  )
| STATS 
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name),
    pod_names = VALUES(k8s.pod.name)
    BY phase_name
| SORT phase_name

config.title: Last Seen Running Pods by Node

query.esql:
FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.node.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase == 2
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp),
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name) BY Node=k8s.node.name    
| EVAL last_update = DATE_DIFF("seconds", last_seen_ts, NOW())
| KEEP Node, podCount,last_update
| SORT podCount DESC

FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.node.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase == 2
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp),
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name) BY Node=k8s.node.name    
| EVAL last_update = DATE_DIFF("seconds", last_seen_ts, NOW())
| KEEP Node, podCount,last_update
| SORT podCount DESC

FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.node.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase == 2
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp),
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name) BY Node=k8s.node.name    
| EVAL last_update = DATE_DIFF("seconds", last_seen_ts, NOW())
| KEEP Node, podCount,last_update
| SORT podCount DESC

query.esql:
FROM metrics-*
| WHERE k8s.pod.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.node.name IS NOT NULL AND k8s.pod.phase == 2
| STATS 
    last_seen_ts = MAX(@timestamp),
    podCount = COUNT_DISTINCT(k8s.pod.name) BY Node=k8s.node.name,Pod=k8s.pod.name    
| EVAL last_update = DATE_DIFF("seconds", last_seen_ts, NOW())
| KEEP Node, Pod,podCount,last_update
| SORT podCount DESC
